Title: toBool
Description: Converts an input value to a value of type Bool. Throws an exception in case of an error.
expr — Expression returning a number or a string. Expression.
Values of type (U)Int8/16/32/64/128/256.Values of type Float32/64.Strings true or false (case-insensitive).
Returns true or false based on evaluation of the argument. Bool.
Examples: SELECT    toBool(toUInt8(1)),    toBool(toInt8(-1)),    toBool(toFloat32(1.01)),    toBool('true'),    toBool('false'),    toBool('FALSE')FORMAT Vertical
